plugin.name: ossaudio
plugin.description: OSS (Open Sound System) support for GStreamer

element.name: ossmixer
element.description: Control sound input and output levels with OSS
element.author: Andrew Vander Wingo <wingo@pobox.com>

element.name: osssink
element.description: Output to a sound card via OSS
element.author: Erik Walthinsen <omega@cse.ogi.edu>, Wim Taymans <wim.taymans@chello.be>

caps.name: sink
caps.details: audio/x-raw-int, endianness=(int){ 1234 }, signed=(boolean){ true, false }, width=(int)16, depth=(int)16, rate=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2 ]; audio/x-raw-int, signed=(boolean){ true, false }, width=(int)8, depth=(int)8, rate=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2 ]

element.name: osssrc
element.description: Capture from a sound card via OSS
element.author: Erik Walthinsen <omega@cse.ogi.edu>, Wim Taymans <wim@fluendo.com>

caps.name: src
caps.details: audio/x-raw-int, endianness=(int){ 1234 }, signed=(boolean){ true, false }, width=(int)16, depth=(int)16, rate=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2 ]; audio/x-raw-int, signed=(boolean){ true, false }, width=(int)8, depth=(int)8, rate=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2 ]
